PSCT.Base: Once per turn, while you control this Tribute Summoned card: You can conduct up to 3 Normal Summons/Sets this turn, not just 1. While this Tribute Summoned card is in the Monster Zone, if your monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Once per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card from your hand; change all Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position.
